title: Türkiye Bursları Success Scholarship
description: Awarded by the Government of Türkiye (YTB) to top-performing international students in recognition of exceptional academic achievement.

title: Student of the Year
description: Awarded for academic achievement and for ranking 1st in the MECAPS Talent Search competition (2019-2020).
